description: This file defines a React functional component named NoteList, which displays a list of note items in a grid layout with loading, error, and empty states. It imports React and another component NoteCard, and exports the NoteList component as the default export.

methods.name: NoteList({ notes, isLoading, error, onEdit, onDelete, deletePendingId })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of notes with loading and error states, using NoteCard components for each note.

ctags.name: NoteList
ctags.pattern: /^function NoteList({ notes, isLoading, error, onEdit, onDelete, deletePendingId }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ notes, isLoading, error, onEdit, onDelete, deletePendingId })
